name: Super Panda Run - Real Challenge
description:
Panda lovers where are you! Its a cute panda waiting for you to make him run like only you guys can do in Super Panda Run Challenge

Panda is running and he wants to collect as many coins as possible. Coins is what will bring panda happiness. With more coins there will be an huge party in the jungle where panda will shower all the coins.

Features
- Cool Graphics
- Awesome Controls
- Smooth Flaw of animations
- HD Animations
- Epic Hurdles
